item.title: One step forward and two steps back
item.description: The first challenge from my committee was to build a 'minimal working example' of people acting on behalf of states, a la Colin Wight's concept of 'structural relationsim'. There's not nearly enough there to build a world out of.

item.title: Studying Complexity in International Relations
item.description: Yesterday, I defended a proposal to my dissertation committee at George Mason University. I want to model world orders by simulating the social mechanisms that culminate to create it. I think this is important for a host of reasons, most of them related war.
